metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13300 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In FFmpeg 3.2 and 4.0.1, an improper argument (AVCodecParameters) passed tothe avpriv_request_sample function in the handle_eac3 function inlibavformat/movenc.c may trigger an out-of-array read while converting acrafted AVI file to MPEG4, leading to a denial of service and possibly aninformation disclosure.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
